catalog_info.title: Tutorial in Sociological Theory
catalog_info.notes: Required first organizational meeting on Monday, January 25, 2016, 4-5pm Required of concentrators, ordinarily sophomores, and secondary concentrators.
catalog_info.description: Provides a critical understanding of selected classical and contemporary theorists, including Marx, Durkheim, Weber, Simmel, Parsons, Coleman, Collins, Bourdieu, and an up-to-date selection of avant-garde theory.
